original_title: José Manuel, la mula y el televisor
overview: Back at home, José Manuel, a farm labourer from Sierra Maestra in Cuba, is watching a television interview he gave about his work when suddenly there is a power cut. Goaded by frustration, he decides to continue the programme, but this time he interviews the local people; equipped only with his mule and an old television set.
title: José Manuel, la mula y el televisor
